th.name: patient_num
th.desc: A unique number assigned to each patient in DataWarehouse.

th.name: preferred_comm_method
th.desc: The patients preferred communication method, as chosen within their PCS settings within CPS-ERX.

th.name: phone_num
th.desc: The patient's phone area code populated in the 'phone call' field for the patient's communication preferences in CPS.

th.name: email_domain
th.desc: The domain of the patient's email address as populated in 'Email' field for the patient's communication preferences in CPS.

th.name: text_message
th.desc: The patient's cell-phone area code populated in the 'text message' field for the patient's communication preferences in CPS.
